title: How to re-create media file from android sender output stream
content:
I would like to perform dynamic analysis on some android apps to check if these apps sending metadata with media files or not.
Ideas like the picture below:
Step 1: I prepared an image with metadata (location, time, etc.)
Step 2: I use an Android app to send the images on Step-1 and try to capture the sender bytes stream.
Step 3: Re-create the image from the bytes stream and check metadata.
I don't have much experience as a reverse engineer so please help me with some ideas or useful tools.
Thank you.

comments.text: I would recommend a rooted device, and mproxy for intercepting the communication. For installing the mproxy root CA certificate you need root permissions as described here docs.mitmproxy.org/stable/â€¦
